name: The Wormery
description:
A 2D puzzle game where you will use a worm to navigate a variety of levels inspired by the classic snake video game.

Game-play

  • Choose from 8 worms that have a variety of different abilities.
  • Complete puzzle levels.
  • Collect resources to trade for coins.
  • Spend coins on abilities.
  • Use ability to help complete levels.
  • Earn stars by completing levels and collecting coins.
  • Spend stars to complete challenge levels.
  • Save and load game.
  • 640 x 640 window display.
  • No sound effects or music.

Versions

Version: Dev 0.0.2

Future updates

  • More level types
  • More worm types
  • Music and sound effects

Technicals

This is a on hold in development game that may contain some bugs.

Download  instructions

Click download and follow the instructions provided then place the .exe file anywhere on your desktop and double click the launch icon to run the game.
